sentences.cn: 打断他人讲话的讨厌习惯

sentences.en: As discussed in Chapter 10, inconsiderate products ask lots of annoying questions.
sentences.cn: 正如我们在第10章中讨论的, 不体贴的软件总是问许多烦人的问题.

sentences.en: He had always found his wife's mother a bit annoying. The mother-daughter relationship, meanwhile, was close.
sentences.cn: 他总是觉得丈母娘有点烦人，然而她们母女之间的关系却非常亲密。

sentences.en: He takes delight in annoying me.
Hiccups can be very annoying in the postoperative period.
sentences.cn: 呃逆在术后期间很令人烦恼.

sentences.en: I wish she would stop annoying us and push off.
sentences.cn: 但愿她能离开,不要再来烦我们了.

sentences.en: It is annoying that there is no hot water.
It was annoying to watch them faffing around when a more direct response was required.
sentences.cn: 需要直言相答时，看他们东拉西扯，真让人恼火。

sentences.en: It's annoying that we can't travel until Thursday, but the upside is that the fare's cheaper then.
sentences.cn: 恼人的是我们星期四才能旅行, 但好处是票价会更便宜.

sentences.en: It's so annoying having to drag out the sewing machine every time I want to make a dress.
sentences.cn: 每次做衣服时我都得把缝纫机拉出来,真烦死人了.

sentences.en: It’s annoying that we didn’t know about this before.
sentences.cn: 令人恼火的是，我们以前并不知道这事。

sentences.en: Jane's always annoying her and she takes it out on me sometimes.
sentences.cn: 简老是惹她生气，她有时就拿我出气。

sentences.en: She seems to revel in annoying her parents.
sentences.cn: 她似乎以惹父母生气为乐.

sentences.en: The annoying thing is he’s usually right.
sentences.cn: 令人气恼的是，他通常都是对的。

sentences.en: The boy broke the teapot. How annoying!
sentences.cn: 这男孩把茶壶打破了, 真可气!

sentences.en: You must have found my attitude annoying.
sentences.cn: 你肯定觉得我的态度讨人厌。

words.tran_cn: 恼人地；烦人地；令人不快地（annoying的副词形式）
